Texto: 
n/a
surgical resection
plain and contrast enhanced ct of the head demonstrate a right cerebellar multicystic mass, which contains an enhancing mural nodule. there is also mass effect upon the fourth ventricle with secondary hydrocephalus.
cerebellar hemangioblastoma
juvenile pilocytic astrocytoma
12 y/o boy with chronic headaches, ataxia and lethargy (off and on for several months).
